string.value: Witch Malady is in need of #bDark Tokens#k. Collect them and bring them to her.
Witch Malady is in need of #bDark Tokens#k. Collect them and bring them to her.
Witch Malady is in need of Dark Tokens. Collect them and bring them to her.
Hey, you there! According to my loyal spy, the bat, you picked up a #bDark Token#k. Is this true?

To normal folks, the Dark Token is of no worth. But for me, it's near priceless! If you can get me the #bDark Tokens#k, I'll give you something that you can surely appreciate. When you are finished with the task, come see me. I am staying in many of the towns. Ha!
How dare you refuse a witch? You're either foolish or really brave. Ha! I'll let you go this time...
